Software Links

The table below gives links to the source code for all components of Hive CI. Please use GitHub issues for the relevant component for any bug reports, feature requests or queries. If in doubt, issues may be raised in the hive-ci repository.

Component Description
Hive Scheduler Web view and job scheduler for the Hive
Hive Mind Device management tool for the Hive
Hive Mind TV TV engine for Hive Mind
Hive Runner Core component of the Hive Runner
Hive Runner Android Android plugin for the Hive Runner
Hive Runner iOS iOS plugin for the Hive Runner
Hive Runner TV TV plugin for the Hive Runner
Hive Messages Libraries for communication between the Runner and Scheduler
Mind Meld API for Hive Mind
Device API Core component of the API for managing devices
Device API for Android Android plugin for Device API
Device API for iOS iOS plugin for Device API
Res Intermediate representation library for test results
Fruity Builder Code manipulation tools for iOS code bases
Code Cache Cached access to source code repositories
Hive Capture Holding application for TV hives
Talkshow Communication bridge for TV tests

Top
